title: Crypto Exchange FTX Expands Into Stock Trading
sub_head: The new stock-trading service will be available to a limited number of U.S. users at first
body:
Crypto exchange FTX will let customers trade stocks and exchange-traded funds on its popular trading app alongside bitcoin and dogecoin.
FTX on Thursday will open access to its new stock-trading service for a limited number of U.S. users, the head of the crypto exchangeâ€™s U.S. arm said in an interview. It plans to expand the functionality to all American customers in the next few months.
